name: Movie Recommender
description: Built a content-based recommendation system using TF-IDF and cosine similarity.

name: Book Recommender
description: Built a collaborative filtering based recommendation system using cosine similarity.

name: Resume Classification
description: Based on your resume content it will suggest suitable role for you (End-2-end)

name: Machine Learning Models From Scratch
description: Building machine learning model from scratch using numpy & pytorch

name: SmartSuggester
description: Smart Suggester is a RAG/Agent-based application that analyzes previously solved support tickets. When a new ticket is raised, it intelligently identifies similar past cases and sends an automated email suggesting that a similar issue has already been resolved by a team member, enabling faster resolutions.
